data: Respondents were asked if they had difficulty hearing (even with hearing aids, for those who use them). Respondents who reported "some" or "a lot" of difficulty or who could not hear at all were classified as having hearing difficulty.

caption: Percentage of difficulty hearing for adults aged 18 and over (95% confidence intervals), United States
caption3: Respondents were asked if they had difficulty hearing (even with hearing aids, for those who use them). Respondents who reported "some" or "a lot" of difficulty or who could not hear at all were classified as having hearing difficulty.
